contest-event.event-date:
May 29, 1965 D Scottish Championship (Championship Section)
Scottish Championship (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest Scottish Championship scottish-championship-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final)
Scotland
Championship
Le Roi d'Ys
Reid Hall, Forfar, Angus, Scotland, UK 15 bands played.
In this year a separate Scottish Area Qualifying contest was held, in the usual February slot in Edinburgh; this separated Scottish Championship contest moved to May.
Best Flugel: Scottish CWS Best Cornet: Bonnybridge Best Euphonium: Tullis Russell
Oct. 20, 2011, 2:02 p.m. Feb. 22, 2015, 10:20 a.m.
